posts.title: Multi-zip high-waisted jeans
posts.body: These Balenciaga jeans see classic blue denim take on a utilitarian form, enriched with pocket and panel detailing. Zip-around accents at the knees and upper thighs mean that this pair can also be styled as shorts or capri pants. Emulate Denma Gvasalia's runway mood by teaming yours with a cardigan and oversized earrings.

posts.title: Janties
posts.body: Underwear or summer wear? Why not both?

posts.title: Upside down jorts
posts.body: Jorts with a raw hem waist

posts.title: A case for jorts
posts.body: With summer almost here, a big topic in the male fashion world is shorts. But all anyone wants to discuss is the “new” proper length. Five- or 11-inch inseam, Stockton-short or Webber-long, that debate doesn’t interest me. No, what I most care about is what fabrics men’s shorts are currently being made of. Because, in my opinion, all those materials suck compared to the one short we all refuse to wear: jorts.

posts.title: Asc or desc?
posts.body: jortSort checks if your inputs are sorted. If they aren’t then you can let the user know they fucked up.
